MLFMV.LS.summary: Farminveste, S.G.P.S., S.A., through its subsidiaries, engages in the pharmacies, pharmaceutical distribution, information systems, healthcare, market intelligence, real estate, and other services businesses. It distributes pharmaceutical products in Portugal; operates a network of eight hospitals and nine outpatient clinics in Lisbon, Almada, Oeiras, Cascais, Sintra, Mafra, Torres Vedras, SantarÃ©m, Coimbra, Viseu, S. JoÃ£o da Madeira, Matosinhos, and Porto, as well as manages Hospital de Braga and Hospital Vila Franca de Xira; and provides consultancy and technological services in the healthcare sector. The company is also involved in the market study in the health area in Portugal, Spain, Ireland, and Germany; and operation of pharmacies. In addition, it invests in the real estate sector. Farminveste, S.G.P.S., S.A. was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Lisbon, Portugal.
